00009 #ifndef __MTIME_H__
00010 #define __MTIME_H__
00011 
00012 const int division = 384;     // 384 ticks, represent a quarter note
00013 
00014 //---------------------------------------------------------
00015 //   MTime
00016 //    "Musical Time"
00017 //    Type 0:  expressed as fraction nominator/denominator
00018 //    Type 1:  midi ticks with resolution of 'division'
00019 //             ticks per quarter note (usually 384)
00020 //---------------------------------------------------------
00021 
00022 class MTime {
00023       int _nominator;
00024       int _denominator;
00025       int _tick;
00026       bool tickTime;
00027 
00028    public:
00029       MTime();
00030       MTime(int z, int n);
00031       MTime(int t);
00032       int tick() const { return _tick; }
00033       void setTick(int t);
00034       void setFrac(int z, int n);
00035       };
00036 
00037 #endif
